00059           public function setRemoveUser($user,$set=1){
00060 
00061                     $user['uid']=$this->makeUid($user['uid']);
00062 
00063                     $zuid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($user['uid']);
00064                     
00065                     // to write less...
00066                     $f=$user;
00067                     
00068                     // Set
00069                     if($set){
00070                               
00071                               // change entries if necessary...
00072 
00073 
00074                               $f['displayname']=$f['fname'].' '.$f['sname'];
00075                               echo "-".$this->check($f['fname'])."-";
00076                               $soap='';
00077                               if($this->check($f['password']))                  $soap.='<password>'.$f['password'].'</password>'; // zimbra needs a password.. :(
00078                               if($this->check($f['displayname']))               $soap.='<a n="displayName">'.$f['displayname'].'</a>';
00079                               if($this->check($f['fname']))                     $soap.='<a n="gn">'.$f['fname'].'</a>';
00080                               if($this->check($f['sname']))                     $soap.='<a n="sn">'.$f['sname'].'</a>';
00081                               if($this->check($f['title']))                     $soap.='<a n="initials">'.$f['title'].'</a>';
00082                               
00083                                #Not needed now
00084                               if($this->check($f['phone'],'phone'))             $soap.='<a n="telephoneNumber">'.$f['phone'].'</a>';
00085                               if($this->check($f['street']))                    $soap.='<a n="street">'.$f['street'].'</a>';
00086                               if($this->check($f['postal'],'postal'))           $soap.='<a n="postalCode">'.$f['postal'].'</a>';
00087                               if($this->check($f['location']))                  $soap.='<a n="l">'.$f['location'].'</a>';
00088                               if($this->check($f['st']))                        $soap.='<a n="st">'.$f['st'].'</a>';
00089                               if($this->check($f['staat']))                     $soap.='<a n="co">'.$f['staat'].'</a>';
00090                               
00091                               
00092                               // <-start specific
00093                               
00094                               if($this->check($f['forwarding_email'],'email')){
00095                                         echo "MAILCHECK";
00096                                         // Wenn als forwarding email_adresse die domain (@domain.com) angegeben ist, dann diese löschen, nicht erlaubt.
00097                                         if(strpos($f['forwarding_email'],  zimbraConfig::defaultEmailDomain)){
00098                                                   $f['forwarding_email']='';
00099                                         }else{
00100                                                   $soap.='<a n="zimbraPrefMailForwardingAddress">'.$f['forwarding_email'].'</a>';    // zimbraMailForwardingAddress = hidden for user...
00101                                         }
00102                               }
00103                               
00104                               // end specific->
00105                               
00106                               // Create
00107                               if($zuid===false){
00108                                         $what='CreateAccountRequest';
00109                                         
00110                                         if(!$this->check($f['password'],'password'))      $soap.='<password>'.$this->dorandompassword().'</password>'; // zimbra needs a password.. :(
00111                                         
00112                                         // <-start specific
00113                                         
00114                                         // generate email alias 
00115                                         if(!$this->check($f['email_alias'],'email') && $f['fname']!='' && $f['sname']!=''){
00116                                                   $a=substr($f['fname'],0,1).'.'.$f['sname'].'@'.zimbraConfig::defaultEmailDomain;
00117                                                   if($this->check($a,'email')){
00118                                                             $f['email_alias'][]=$a;
00119                                                   }
00120                                         }
00121                                         // default class of service
00122                                         if($f['cos']==''){
00123                                                   $cos=$this->getCosIdbyName($f['defaultuser']);
00124                                                   if($cos!=-1)                            $soap.='<a n="zimbraCOSId">'.$cos.'</a>';                   
00125                                         }
00126                                         // end specific ->
00127                                         
00128                                         $soap='<name>'.$f['uid'].'</name>'.$soap;
00129 
00130                               // Modify
00131                               }else{
00132                                         $what='ModifyAccountRequest';
00133                                         $soap='<id>'.$zuid.'</id>'.$soap;       
00134                               }
00135                               
00136                               // Execute soap
00137                               if($soap!=''){
00138                                         $soap=array($what,$soap);
00139                                         
00140                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00141                                         if($what=='CreateAccountRequest'){
00142                                                   $zuid=$ret['soap:Body']['CreateAccountResponse']['account']['id'];
00143                                         }else{
00144                                                   $zuid=$ret['soap:Body']['ModifyAccountResponse']['account']['id'];
00145                                         }
00146                               }
00147                               
00148                               // Manage Aliase
00149                               if($f['email_alias']!=''){
00150                                         $this->_doAccountAliase($zuid,$f['email_alias'],'user','uid');
00151                               }
00152                     
00153                     // Delete, works.
00154                     }else{
00155                               
00156                               // Nothing to delete
00157                               if($zuid==-1){
00158                                         return array(-1,'User "'.$user['uid'].'" doesn t exist');
00159                                         
00160                               // Delete
00161                               }else{
00162                                         $soap=array('DeleteAccountRequest','<id>'.$zuid.'</id>');
00163                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap,1);
00164                               }
00165                     }
00166           }

00184           private function check(&$value,$mode=0){
00185                     if($value=='-'){
00186                               $value='';
00187                               return true;
00188                     }
00189                     $value=trim($value);
00190                     switch($mode){
00191                               case 0:
00192                               case '0': if($value=='' || $value==null)return false;break;
00193                               case 'phone': if($value=='')return false;break;
00194                               case 'postal': if(!is_numeric($value))return false;break;
00195                               case 'password': if($value=='')return false;break;
00196                               case 'email': if(!preg_match( "/^([a-zA-Z0-9])+([a-zA-Z0-9._-])*@([a-zA-Z0-9_-])+([a-zA-Z0-9._-]+)+$/", $value))return false;break;
00197                               default: return false;
00198                     }
00199                     return true;
00200           }
00201           
00211           private function dorandompassword(){
00212                     srand(microtime(1));
00213                     return md5(rand());
00214           }

00225           public function setRemoveDistribution($distribution,$set=1){
00226                     
00227                     $zdid=$this->getDistributionIdbyName($distribution['did']);
00228                     
00229                     // Set
00230                     if($set){
00231                               
00232                               // Create
00233                               if($zdid==-1){
00234                                         $soap=array('CreateDistributionListRequest','<name>'.$email.'</name>');
00235                                         
00236                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00237 
00238                                         if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['CreateDistributionListResponse']['dl']['id'])){
00239                                                   $id=$ret['soap:Body']['CreateDistributionListResponse']['dl']['id'];
00240                                                   
00241                                                   $this->_doAccountAliase($did,$distribution['alias'],'dist');
00242                                         }
00243                               // Modify
00244                               }else{
00245                                         // what to modify??
00246                                         //$soap='<a n="...">...</a>';
00247                                         //$soap.='<a n="...">...</a>';
00248                                         
00249                                         $soap=array('ModifyDistributionListRequest','<id>'.$zdid.'</id>'.$soap);
00250                                         
00251                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00252                                         
00253                                         $this->_doAccountAliase($did,$distribution['alias'],'dist');
00254                               }
00255                     
00256                     // Delete
00257                     }else{
00258

00260                               if($zdid==-1){

00292           public function _doAccountAliase($id,$alias,$distlist='user',$idby='name'){
00293                     
00294                     // User Alias
00295                     if($distlist=='user'){
00296                               if($idby=='name'){
00297                                         $zid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($id);
00298                               }else{
00299                                         $zid=$id;
00300                               }
00301                               
00302                               $what='AccountAlias';
00303                     
00304                     // Distribution Alias
00305                     }else if($distlist=='ist'){
00306                               if($idby=='name'){
00307                                         $zid=$this->getDistributionIdbyName($id);
00308                               }else{
00309                                         $zid=$id;
00310                               }
00311                               
00312                               $what='DistributionListAlias';
00313                     }
00314           
00315                     if($zid==-1){
00316                               return array(-1,'Error "'.$id.'" not found');     
00317                     }
00318                     
00319                     foreach($alias as $alias2) {
00320                               $a=substr($alias2,0,1);
00321                               
00322                               if($a=='-'||$a=='+')$alias2=substr($alias2,1); // Remove all + and -, only first is used.
00323                               
00324                               $soap='<id>'.$zid.'</id><alias>'.$alias2.'</alias>';
00325                               
00326                               if($a=='-'){
00327                                         $soap=array('Remove'.$what.'Request',$soap);
00328                               }else{
00329                                         $soap=array('Add'.$what.'Request',$soap);
00330                               }
00331                               
00332                               $this->doadminsoap($soap,1);
00333                     }
00334           }

00355           function _setClassOfService($user,$cosname){
00356                     $zuid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($user);
00357                     if(!$zuid)return false;
00358                     
00359                     $cosid=$this->getCosIdbyName($cosname);
00360                     if(!$cosid)return false;
00361                     
00362                     $soap=array('ModifyAccountRequest','<id>'.$zuid.'</id><a n="zimbraCOSId">'.$cosid.'</a>');
00363 
00364                     return $this->doadminsoap($soap,1);               
00365           }

00379           function UserChangeDistributionlists($uid,$dids){
00380                     
00381                     $zuid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($user['uid']);
00382                     
00383                     if($zuid==-1){
00384                                         return array(-1,'Error "'.$uid.'" not found');
00385                     }
00386                     
00387                     foreach($dids as $did1){
00388                                         
00389                               $a=substr(0,1,$did1);
00390                               $did=str_replace(array('+','-'),'',substr(1,$did1)); // Remove all + and -, only first is used.
00391                               
00392                               $dist=$this->getDistributionbyName($verteilerlistid);
00393                                         
00394                               if($dist['zid']==-1){
00395                                         $err[]=array(-1,'Error "'.$did.'" not found');
00396                                         continue;
00397                               }
00398                               
00399                               $found=in_array($email,$member);
00400                               
00401                               $soap='<id>'.$dist['zid'].'</id><dlm>'.$uid.'</dlm>';
00402                               
00403                               // Action...
00404                               if($a=='-'){
00405                                         if(!$found)continue; // If already not in list continue
00406                                         $soap=array('RemoveDistributionListMemberRequest',$soap);
00407                               }else{
00408                                         if($found)continue; // if already in list continue
00409                                         if($a!='+')$alias=$a.$alias;
00410                                         $soap=array('AddDistributionListMemberRequest',$soap);
00411                               }
00412                               
00413                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00414                     }
00415           }

00429           function DistributionlistChangeUser($did,$uids){
00430                     
00431                     $dist=$this->getDistributionbyName($did);
00432                                         
00433                     if($dist['zid']==-1){
00434                               return array(-1,'Error "'.$did.'" not found');
00435                     }
00436                               
00437                     $soap_r=''; // remove uids
00438                     $soap_a=''; // add uids
00439                               
00440                     foreach($uids as $uid){
00441                                         
00442                               $a=substr(0,1,$did1);
00443                               $did=str_replace(array('+','-'),'',substr(1,$did1)); // Remove all + and -, only first is used.
00444                               $found=in_array($uid,$member);
00445                               
00446                               // Action...
00447                               if($a=='-'){
00448                                         if(!$found)continue; // If already not in list continue
00449                                         $soap_r.='<dlm>'.$param.'</dlm>';
00450                               }else{
00451                                         if($found)continue; // if already in list continue
00452                                         if($a!='+')$alias=$a.$alias;
00453                                         $soap_a.='<dlm>'.$param.'</dlm>';
00454                               }
00455                     }
00456                     // If there are users to add
00457                     if($soap_a!=''){
00458                               $soap=array('AddDistributionListMemberRequest','<id>'.$did.'</id>'.$soap_a);
00459                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00460                     }
00461 
00462                     // If there are users to remove
00463                     if($soap_r!=''){
00464                               $soap=array('RemoveDistributionListMemberRequest','<id>'.$did.'</id>'.$soap_r);
00465                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);         
00466                     }
00467           }

00477           function getCosIdbyName($cosname){
00478                     $cachegroup='cosids';
00479                     $cname=$cosname;
00480                     
00481                     $cache=$this->getCache($cachegroup,$cname);
00482                     if(!$cache){
00483                               
00484                               $soap=array('GetCosRequest','<cos by="name">'.$cosname.'</cos>');
00485                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00486                               
00487                               $cache=c($ret['soap:Body']['GetCosResponse']['cos']['id']);
00488                               
00489                               if(!$cache){
00490                                   return false;
00491                               }
00492                               $this->setCache($cachegroup,$cname,$cache);
00493                     }
00494                     
00495                     return $cache;
00496           }

00507           function getDistributionIdbyName($name,$getlist=0){
00508                     
00509                     $soap='<dl by="name">'.$name.'</dl>'; 
00510                     $found=-1;
00511                     if($getlist==0){
00512                               $soap.='<limit>1</limit>';
00513                     }
00514                     $soap=array('GetDistributionListRequest',$soap);
00515                     
00516                     
00517                     $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00518 
00519                     $id=c($ret['soap:Body']['GetDistributionListResponse']['dl']['id']);
00520                     if(!$id)return false;
00521 
00522                     if($getlist){
00523                           return array($id,c($ret['soap:Body']['GetDistributionListResponse']['dl']['dlm']));
00524                     }
00525                     return $id;
00526           }
